articles.title: Australian Boomers beat Team USA's NBA superstars in Tokyo Olympics warm-up game - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: Aussies send Americans into crisis before Games
articles.content:
Australia have beaten the USA 91-83 in a Tokyo Olympics warm-up game in Las Vegas.
America's NBA superstars compounded their loss to Nigeria on Sunday (AEST) with another defeat, while the Boomers c… [+5490 chars]

articles.author: Harriet Alexander, Ariel Zilber, Nikki Schwab
articles.title: Cuba's president blames America's 'politics of economic asphyxiation' for unrest after protest - Daily Mail
articles.description: Cuba's president, Miguel Diaz-Canel, on Monday blamed the United States for the protests that swept his nation on Sunday, saying the embargo was strangling the country and hurting the people.
articles.content: Cuba's president has blamed the United States for the most widespread unrest in his country for 30 years, accusing Washington of sending mercenaries to foment protest and strangling the country econo… [+26021 chars]

articles.content:

articles.author: Paul J. Weber and Will Weissert
articles.title: Texas Democrats leave state to try to stop GOP voting bill - CTV News
articles.description: Democrats in the Texas Legislature on Monday bolted for Washington, D.C., and said they were ready to remain there for weeks in a second revolt against a GOP overhaul of election laws, forcing a dramatic new showdown over voting rights in America.
